DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) daily life activity patient COPD also determine socio-demographic profile , daily life style need patient COPD .
DOC.brief_title: Cross-sectional Study Investigate Effects Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Daily Life Activities
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis COPD Outpatient treatment reason Current exsmoker An exacerbation COPD still last experience within last 3 month History asthma and/or allergic rhinitis The presence another important respiratory disease
